column5: just to let everyone know there is about 8inch of ice in the bonfield area of lake nosbonsing .
Isn't that Lake close to Callander?
great i also just found out that there is lots of lakes in the bancroft area that are frozen good and ready to fish,well clampet its a ways east & south from callendar...check out mapquest....cheers
Yes callander and nosbonsing are only about 20 miles apart i haven't heard about callander but it must be almost the same - 25 all week should make alot of ice .
Last report from today was only 5.5 inches on Callander Bay, where the hut operations are. Not thick enough for the bungaloos yet..

Well thats tempting.Its time to visit my mom in Bonfield she lives 2 minutes from lake Nosbonsing on HWY 531.I have fished there in the winter before .I have seen the ice almost 4 feet thick on that lake.Good walleye fishing and huge Pike.
